嬻字的基本解释

嬻
dú
〔媟（
xi?）嬻〕古同“亵渎”，轻慢，对人不尊敬。

嬻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
亵渎。

嬻字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬻； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页273第28
【唐韻】【集韻】?徒谷切，音獨。【說文】媟嬻也。【周語】?侯棄其伉儷，而淫于夏氏，不亦嬻姓矣乎。　別作嬻。

嬻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嬻字的起名意思

暂无。

嬻
du
〔lust(
xi?) 嬻] Gu Tong is "blasphemy", frivolous, and disrespectful to people.
嬻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
Blasphemy.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬻; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 273 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tuguqie, with independent sound. 【Speaking text】Yangyuan also. [Zhou Yu]? Hou Qiqi and his wife, and lewd in the Xia family, is not the same as the surname.　Don't make mistakes.
